math/

rms.pro


top source rms

Math

result = rms(X, _extra=_extra)

Calculates the root-mean-square of a set of values. Extra parameters such as DIMENSION are passed through to MEAN.

Return value

Calculates the square root of the mean of the squares of X.

Parameters

X in

Array of values.

Keywords

_extra

Examples

x = 4. * RANDOMN(seed, 10000) rmsx = RMS(x)

Author information

History:

Written by: Jeremy Bailin 12 June 2008 Public release in JBIU 27 May 2015 Added _EXTRA to mean call
